author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Using cache identifier in SleepProducer makes it easier to assign the sleeps to Events whose IDs originate from somewhere else than e.g. EmptySource (like real data). The cache identifier behavior for Events becomes easier to understand when different Principals use different cache identifiers. With a global cache identifier counter e.g. the number of concurrent lumis would impact the first cache identifier value the SleepProducer sees.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1387

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests pass. A private test with the cache identifier (not included here, but will likely come in a future PR)
title: Use separate cache identifiers for different Principals, and add an option to use the Event cache identifier in SleepProducer
